title: Trading the Market Crash: April Newsletter
description: Discover how traders profited from the April market crash using leveraged put options on Panoptic, with trade insights and strategies for capital-efficient downside protection.

title: The Magnificent Seven Gamma Traps of Crypto
description: Explore how the seven inherent gamma traps in crypto markets fuel self-perpetuating price feedback loops, and learn how on-chain options strategies can help traders harness these powerful volatility swings.

title: Make Uniswap Great Again
description: Panoptic enhances Uniswap liquidity provision by integrating options strategies, enabling LPs to earn up to 3x more!

title: gRHO, Unichain & ETH Denver Highlights: March Newsletter
description: The March Panoptic Newsletter covers our Uniswap v4 launch with perpetual options for active LPs and gRHO for passive LPs, Unichain integration, recent market insights, new incentive programs, our ETH Denver recap, and more!

title: Panoptic at ETH Denver 2025
